select a.id,a.text,(case when exists(select 1 from role_user r where r.roleId=#{roleId} and r.userId=a.id) then true else false end) checked,'1' orderSeq From view_user a Where isDeleted=0 and text like '%${text}%'
and a.flag like '${flag}%'
union all select a.id,a.text,(case when exists(select 1 from role_user r where r.roleId=#{roleId} and r.userId=a.id) then true else false end) checked,'0' orderSeq From view_user a Where isDeleted=0 and text not like '%${text}%'
and a.flag like '${flag}%'
order by orderSeq desc,checked desc;

select t1.name as name, idcard as cardNum, (case when sex=1 then '男' else '女' end )as sex, t2.name as school, GROUP_CONCAT(t3.name) as classroom from teacher_info t1 left join unit_info t2 on t1.schoolId=t2.id right join class_info t3 on t1.id=t3.classTeacher where t1.userId=(select id from user_info where isDeleted=0 and text=#{username} and password=#{password}) group by name,cardNum,sex,school

select t1.name as name, idcard as cardNum, (case when sex=1 then '男' else '女' end )as sex, t2.name as school, GROUP_CONCAT(t3.name) as classroom, t4.text as username, t4.password as password from teacher_info t1 left join unit_info t2 on t1.schoolId=t2.id right join class_info t3 on t1.id=t3.classTeacher left join user_info t4 on t1.userId=t4.id where 1=1 group by name,cardNum,sex,school,password
